content:
# The command to move to the nearest Copper Ore resource patch has not provided any immediate feedback.
# I will now attempt to harvest Copper Ore directly from the nearest patch to gather more resources.

# Let's harvest 10 units of Copper Ore to ensure I can continue smelting in the Stone Furnace.
harvest_resource(position=nearest_copper_patch, quantity=10)  # Harvesting 10 units of Copper Ore from the patch.
print(f"Inventory after harvesting Copper Ore: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check inventory after harvesting.
